member.name: T:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.Rc5UniversalRemote
member.summary: The RC5/Universal IR Remote symbol allows RC5 and Sharp code compatible IR remotes to communicate with a Crestron CNXRMIRD detector/receiver. RC5 code is 14 bits long and includes a 5-bit address (or "System Number") and a 6-bit "Command Number". Device must be registered if added to an internal IR input port such as on the MC3. If added to an external device like the C2N-IRGW only the C2N-IRGW is registered.

member.name: T:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.Wpr48
member.summary: The WPR-48 is a handheld remote that communicates via IR or 1-way RF with any Crestron control system. Only IR is supported in SimplSharpPro. Device must be registered if added to an internal IR input port such as on the MC3. If added to an external device like the C2N-IRGW only the C2N-IRGW is registered.

member.summary: Method to fire the UfoWpr3erPageStateChange event.This event is fired whenever any sig change happens on the current page.
member.param: Information from the Crestron UFO-WPR-3ER User Configurable Pages on what changed.

member.summary: Constructor to generate a new UFO-WPR-3ER UFO Waterproof Wireless LCD Remote
member.param: RFID of this device on the gateway.
RF gateway to attach this device to.
member.exception: RFID passed is out of range.
The gateway specified is not initialized.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.UfoWpr3er._CrestronUfoWpr3erUserConfigurablePageSigs_SigChange(Crestron.SimplSharpPro.CrestronDeviceWithEvents,Crestron.SimplSharpPro.SigEventArgs)
member.summary: Method to handle the all the user configurable pages sig change events. Page number, sig and sig index are passed to the user event handler. Sig index is only applicable for ListItemSelectedFeedbackSigs and is index into the ListItemSelectedFeedbackSigs collection. Sig passed will be output sig for which sig change event occurred. Page also passed corresponding to the sig change event occurred.
member.exception: Invalid page type received.
Invalid page number received.
Page not found in the collection.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.UfoWpr3er.AddPage(Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.eWirelessRemotePageTypes,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Method to add user configurable page to the corresponding collection. This will override and previous configuration for the specified number. The valid page numbers are from 3 to 254.
member.returns: Reference to newly added user page.
member.param: Enum value of page type.
User defined page number.This number corresponds to the actual page number defined in the VTPro-e project.
member.exception: Invalid page number passed.
Invalid page type passed.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Remotes.UfoWpr3er.RemovePage(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Method to remove user configured page from the corresponding collection. The valid page numbers are from 3 to 254.
member.param: User defined page number.This number corresponds to the actual page number defined in the VTPro-e project.
member.exception: Invalid page number passed.
Page corresponding to page number passed not found.
Invalid page type passed.
